# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(text::AbstractString, text_width::Int=10)
    lines = Vector{SubString{String}}(undef, 0)
    current_line = ""
    for word in collect(text)
        if length(current_line) + length(word) > text_width
            push!(lines, current_line)
            current_line = ""
        end
        current_line *= word
        current_line *= " "
    end
    # Handle the last line
    if current_line != ""
        push!(lines, current_line)
    end
    return join(lines)
end
```

Example usage:

```julia
julia> wrap_string("Hello World This is a very long text that needs to be wrapped.")
"Hello World\nThis is a very long text\nthat needs to be wrapped."
```
